Homepage.title: Track Your Tibia Character Progress
Homepage.subtitle: Dominate your progress, rise above the rest. ðŸ”¥
Homepage.description: Start tracking your character's progress in Tibia
Homepage.examples: Discover top players from your world and see their achievements.
Homepage.tips: Learn how to effectively track your daily XP progress and plan for your next level.

CharacterPage.notFound: Character not found. Please check the name and try again. TibiaRise tracks only players in the top 1000 of their world highscores. If your character is below this ranking in your world, it wonâ€™t appear in our database. Keep leveling up and check back later!

cta.description: Find out how many days you need to reach your desired level.
cta.label: Set Your Goal

goal.title: Set a Level Goal
goal.description: What level would you like to achieve?

level.label: Level
level.error: The target level must be greater than your current level.

result.message: In the past month, you averaged <dailyExperienceHighlight>{dailyExperience}</dailyExperienceHighlight> XP per day, and you need an additional <remainingExperienceHighlight>{remainingExperience}</remainingExperienceHighlight> to reach your goal. If you maintain this XP rate, you'll achieve level <goalLevelHighlight>{goalLevel}</goalLevelHighlight> in <daysHighlight>{days}</daysHighlight> days.
result.estimatedDate: Estimated date to reach your goal

disclaimer.message: Want to know how many days you need to achieve your goal with custom experience rates? Use the <simulator>Experience Simulator</simulator>.

goal.additionalStats: View vocation distribution, best hunts, and tips tailored to your character's level.
goal.customGoals: Receive personalized suggestions for your goals based on your play history, like reaching level Y in Z days.

table.trends: View graphs showing XP growth trends by world.
table.xpAverage: Compare average XP for each world against global averages.

SupportPage.title: Support TibiaRise Development
SupportPage.message1: If you'd like to support TibiaRise's ongoing development, consider donating some Tibia Coins to <character>Gui</character>.
SupportPage.message2: Please also send me an in-game letter; I truly appreciate all support and would love to hear your feedback and thoughts on the project.
SupportPage.message3: Feel free to join our <discord>Discord</discord> server to share your ideas and feedback with the community, report bugs, or anything else. ðŸš€
SupportPage.recognition: Consider adding a list of contributors or supporter badges.
SupportPage.successStories: Include testimonials from players who achieved their goals using TibiaRise.

ExperienceSimulatorPage.visualGraphs: Incorporate visual graphs to illustrate your daily progress towards your goals.
